scenario:
HP Inc. (NYSE: HPQ) has announced a new lineup of commercial next-gen AI PCs and solutions that empower professionals to collaborate and lead like never before. The new lineup includes the HP EliteBook Ultra G1i, the world's most immersive AI business notebook, and the HP ZBook Ultra G1a, the world's most powerful 14-inch mobile workstation. The HP Z2 Mini G1a, the world's most powerful mini workstation, also features in the lineup.

The HP EliteBook Ultra G1i is powered by up to 48 TOPS of NPU performance with Intel Core Ultra 5 and 7 processors, allowing for faster local AI performance, faster presentation creation, and personalized emails. The device also features a built-in recording studio experience, a 9MP camera, dual microphone, quad speaker design, and AI-powered Poly Camera Pro conferencing experiences.

The HP ZBook Ultra G1a is designed for professionals who need high-performance computing on the go. It features up to 16 desktop-class CPU cores, discrete-like integrated graphics, and up to 128GB of innovative unified memory architecture. The device also features a long-lasting battery, Next-Gen AI PC features, and AI-enhanced privacy.

HP has also announced the HP Z2 Mini G1a, a compact and powerful mini workstation that is designed for professionals who need high-performance computing in a small form factor. The device features the AMD Ryzen AI Max PRO processor and scalable 128GB of innovative unified memory architecture with the ability to assign up to 96 GB exclusively to the GPU.

In addition to the new PCs, HP has also announced the HP Thunderbolt 4 G6 Docks, which transform how professionals connect, manage, and protect their workspace. The docks feature proximity activation, which wakes connected peripherals and PCs upon approach, and provide high-speed power alongside a single-cable connection to multiple monitors.

The new lineup of PCs and solutions from HP is designed to empower professionals to work more efficiently and effectively, and to stay ahead in a modern workspace. The devices are expected to be available on HP.com in the coming months, with pricing to be announced closer to availability.

Intel Core Ultra 5 and 7 processors are featured in the HP EliteBook Ultra G1i, providing up to 48 TOPS of NPU performance. The HP ZBook Ultra G1a features up to 16 desktop-class CPU cores, discrete-like integrated graphics, and up to 128GB of innovative unified memory architecture.
